titleStmt.title: Mr. Perkins's letter to Mr. Cornwell And other ministers at Tunbridge-Wells, who denied him the use of the pulpit there. And have not answered the letter, as desired.
titleStmt.author: Perkins, Joseph, b. 1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, and sold by J. Bradford in New-street without Bishops-gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
